title.rendered: Receive A Free Gift With the Sony Xperia 1 IV 5G & Sony Xperia 10 IV 5G

content.rendered:
Both the Sony Xperia 1 IV 5G and the Sony Xperia 10 IV 5G are incredible handsets, with a lot to offer, from the Xperia 10 IV’s premium triple rear lens to the Xperia 1 IV’s 6.5-inch 4K HDR OLED Wide display. But did you know that Sony are also offering free gifts along with their flagship handsets? Keep scrolling to find out what’s up for grabs!

Sony Xperia 1 IV 5G Free Gift

Those who order the Sony Xperia 1 IV 5G from Fonehouse will receive a free pair of WH-1000XM4 headphones, to help you bring in summer 2022 with a bang. Sony is known for their signature quality sound, and these headphones are worth a whopping £279. So take the plunge, purchase this handset, and enjoy music-listening perfection for free. 

What Can Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones Do?

With the Sony WH-1000XM4 Headphones, music playing will be an immersive and concert-worthy experience. This is thanks to the headphone’s advanced noise-cancelling ability and premium sound. Side note: they’re also wireless! So whether you’re on your daily commute to work, or finding your inner zen whilst in your local cafe, these top-quality headphones will be there to make your day better. This free gift with the Sony Xperia 1 IV 5G is available from 11/05/22 to 18/07/22, so you’ll need to hurry whilst stocks last. 

If you’ve reached this point I’m pretty sure you’re itching to get your hands on this new Sony flagship handset so you can secure your free gift. Well, what are you waiting for? Place your orders with Fonehouse today. 

Sony Xperia 10 IV 5G Free Gift

If you order the Sony Xperia 10 IV 5G from Fonehouse you’ll be sent a free pair of WF-CF500 earbuds as a little thank you. This piece of tech gear is worth £59 and is a great option if you prefer lightweight tech with a sleek feel. 

What Can Sony WF-C500 Earbuds Do?

The WF-C500 earbuds despite their small and compact size are jam-packed with fantastic sound thanks to DSEE technology. These wireless earbuds also feature an ergonomic surface design which means they’re specifically designed to fit comfortably in your ear – perfect for listening to music whilst doing activities like long walks or gym sessions. This free gift is up for grabs with the Sony Xperia 10 IV 5G from 23/05/22 to 21/07/22 whilst stocks last so you’ll have to be quick.

If you’ve reached this point I’m pretty sure you’re itching to get your hands on one of the new Sony flagship handsets so you can secure your free gift. Well, what are you waiting for? Place your orders with Fonehouse now.
